addVictim(string,string).details: Only owner and contributor can use this function to add victim to storage.

getVictim(uint16).details: Function used in frontend to get the user infomation.
getVictim(uint16).return: _idx User index of requests.vt.name User name of requests.vt.addr User local address of requests.

modifyVictim(uint16,string,string).details: Only owner and contributor can use this function to modify victim infomation.It can be modified only within the time limit.

setContributor(address,bool).details: Only owner can use this function to change contributor's state.

params._state: True or false for updating state.

devdoc.title: Remember Jeju 4.3 Tragedy

setContributor(address,bool).notice: Set contributor's state true or false.

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract to create online memorial database based on smart contracts.
